value.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production
value.excerpt: Secure your web applications on Azure and protect your apps against the most common and dangerous web application attacks.

images.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path guides data engineers through the evolving benefits your organization gains with Azure cloud data platform technologies.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Learn how data systems are evolving and how the changes affect data professionals. Explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions, and consider sample business cases that apply cloud technologies.

images.title: Understand the evolving world of data

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure technologies that analyze text and images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data. See how data engineers can choose the technologies that meet their business needs and scale to meet demand securely.

images.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer. Find out how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI professionals. Explore common data engineering practices and a high-level architecting process for a data-engineering project.

images.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
Understand the evolving world of data

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer
value.excerpt: Explore how the world of data has evolved and how the advent of cloud technologies is providing new opportunities for business to explore. You will learn the various data platform technologies that are available, and how a Data Engineer can take advantage of this technology to an organization benefit.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Learn how data systems are evolving and how the changes affect data professionals. Explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions, and consider sample business cases that apply cloud technologies.

images.title: Understand the evolving world of data

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure technologies that analyze text and images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data. See how data engineers can choose the technologies that meet their business needs and scale to meet demand securely.

images.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer. Find out how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI professionals. Explore common data engineering practices and a high-level architecting process for a data-engineering project.

images.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
Understand the evolving world of data

value.title: Machine learning crash course
value.excerpt: A high-level overview of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Modules are aimed at people with little or no knowledge of computer science and statistics. You will cover the essential concepts of AI and learn how to apply custom machine learning solutions with free, easy to use tools. You will learn simple but powerful ways that AI practitioners make predictions about objects, people, and the future. Then, you’ll cover exciting, complex topics you may have heard of, such as neural networks, computer vision, deep learning, and unsupervised learning.

topItems.title: Predict numeric values with regression
topItems.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

images.title: Predict numeric values with regression

topItems.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
topItems.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
Predict numeric values with regression

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using Durable Functions.

images.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security
value.excerpt: Learn how to incorporate security into your architecture design, and discover the tools that Azure provides to help you create a secure environment through all the layers of your architecture.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security

value.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Combine multiple Azure Functions apps into a unified interface by importing them into a single Azure API Management instance.

images.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management

value.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
value.excerpt: Use application logs in Azure Web Apps to help debug web app code.

images.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging

value.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
value.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer. Find out how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI professionals. Explore common data engineering practices and a high-level architecting process for a data-engineering project.

images.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture

value.title: Enabling digital transformation
value.excerpt: Digital transformation is a business innovation fueled by the explosion of the cloud, artificial intelligence (AI), and the internet of things (IoT).  and allows organizations with new ways to understand and transform their business.

images.title: Enabling digital transformation

value.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification
value.excerpt: Use machine learning models to categorize data. Build a logistic regression model and support vector machine models to predict categories like win/loss and tree species.

images.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification

value.title: Predict numeric values with regression
value.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

images.title: Predict numeric values with regression

value.title: Load balance your web service traffic with Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Improve application resilience by distributing load across multiple servers and use path-based routing to direct web traffic.

images.title: Load balance your web service traffic with Application Gateway

value.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure technologies that analyze text and images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data. See how data engineers can choose the technologies that meet their business needs and scale to meet demand securely.

images.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform

value.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
value.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

images.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer

value.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload
value.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of disk storage options for virtual machine workloads. Identify the features of capabilities of each type to ensure your application performs optimally.

images.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload

value.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes
value.excerpt: Learn how to control Azure virtual network traffic by implementing custom routes.

images.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes

value.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

images.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

value.title: Create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Create users in Azure Active Directory. Understand different types of groups. Create a group and add members. Manage business-to-business guest accounts.

images.title: Create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory

value.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Create a Docker image and store it in a repository in Azure Container Registry. Use Azure App Service to deploy a web application based on the Docker image. Configure continuous deployment for the web app by using a webhook that monitors the Docker image for changes.

images.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service

value.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure
value.excerpt: You have a traditional on-premises infrastructure that you need to connect to resources in Azure. In this module, you learn how to select a connectivity method for your use cases that balances functionality, cost, and security.

images.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure

value.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
value.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

images.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure

value.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager
value.excerpt: Azure Traffic Manager provides DNS load balancing to your application, so you improve your ability to distribute your application around the world. Use Traffic Manager to improve the performance and availability of your application.

images.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager

value.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data
value.excerpt: Learn about non-relational databases, and how they compare to relational databases. Understand the different types of non-relational databases commonly used by applications.

images.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data

value.title: Implement message-based communication workflows with Azure Service Bus
value.excerpt: Write C# code in a custom application that sends and receives messages using Azure Service Bus topics and queues.

images.title: Implement message-based communication workflows with Azure Service Bus

value.title: Introduction to Python
value.excerpt: Learn how to write basic Python code, declare variables, and work with console input and output

images.title: Introduction to Python

value.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

images.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI

value.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to use RBAC to manage access to resources in Azure.

images.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
